item.title: Machine Learning Algorithms from Scratch
item.description: This is an ongoing project that showcases the various common, supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms coded from scratch using basic Python libraries such as Numpy, Pandas and Matplotlib.

item.title: Lake Erie Water Levels - A Time Series Analysis (4-part study)
item.description: In summer 2019, high water levels wreaked havoc on the communities bordering the Great Lakes leading to widespread damage in coastal cities, eroding shorelines and beaches.

item.title: Exploring Healthcare Provider Shortage in U.S. (4-part study)
item.description: America has a severe shortage of healthcare providers. Demand for services is increasing and shortages of physicians and mental health providers are limiting patientsâ€™ access to required treatment.

item.title: Face Recognition using Principal Components Analysis
item.description: The purpose of this project is to discuss a popular approach to face recognition called Eigenfaces.

item.title: Exploring Correlation between Corruption and Development
item.description: The purpose of this project is to perform data visualization to explore the relationship between Corruption and Human Development across various nations based on UN Human Development Report.
